line_2: Fond of applause, he sought the feasts

line_1: To one peculiar sort of beasts,
To see themselves fall endlong into Beasts,
line_2: Not more Amazement seiz'd on Circe's Guests,

line_1: Not half so happy as the watchful Beasts,
line_2: While drowzy Man in Sleep unactive rests,

line_1: With glaring Eyes affright the howling Beasts,
line_2: And little Birds shrink closer in their Nests.
